segments.text: Doctor , I have the worst toothache !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long have you had this pain ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: For about a week or so , but it â€™ s gotten really bad in the last couple of days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you do anything that might have aggravated your tooth ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know , I was eating jawbreakers in the movies the other day , and I accidentally bit down really hard on one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of toothbrush do you use ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just use a regular hard bristle toothbrush .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does it bother you when you eat something really cold ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it definitely bothers me more when I do that .
segments.speaker: S1
